LanguageData.CDR_AnimalDeathRate: Animals: Chance of instant death on downed.
LanguageData.CDR_PawnDeathRate: Pawn: Chance of instant death on downed.
LanguageData.CDR_UseStorytellerModifier: Use storyteller population and difficulty curve?
LanguageData.CDR_UseStorytellerModifierTooltip:
When this is enabled, any adjustment to pawn death on downed chance applies to the chanced provided by the storyteller curve.
When disabled, pawn death chance ignores storyteller values and applies a flat chance of death when downed.
